title: 大家觉得MC里最恶心的怪物是什么？
author: modpromulgator

replies.author: ang_cheng
replies.txt_content:
LZ





绝逼是LZ

replies.author: 8哥
replies.txt_content: 史蒂夫

replies.author: .|°夨.忆ヽ
replies.txt_content: 熊孩纸QAQ
蠹虫声音很恶心 恶魂长的很可怕

replies.author: Red_lg
replies.txt_content: 洞穴蜘蛛 恶心死了 看到就鸡皮疙瘩 还有毒

replies.author: 纷飛
replies.txt_content: 蠕虫。。成群的

replies.author: 子弹～
replies.txt_content:

蠕虫。。成群的
那叫蠹虫

replies.txt_content: 当然是LZ

replies.author: Gong_Pu
replies.txt_content: 史莱姆和蠹虫。

replies.author: DC_kai.wen
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕，：sssssssss~  :我不是故意的

replies.txt_content: 不是蠕虫，是蠹（du第四声）虫

replies.author: ID:xiao_yao
replies.txt_content: 什么都不恶心  除非是带甲僵尸加小白  自己裸装

replies.author: .|°夨.忆ヽ
replies.txt_content:

是 蠹虫

replies.txt_content:
mine米 发表于 2015-9-12 13:19
不是蠕虫，是蠹（du第四声）虫
 我习惯叫蠕虫= =

replies.author: MRTangwin8
replies.txt_content:
蠹虫的确……很像老鼠
不过有熊孩子的皮肤恶心吗

replies.author: ffxh
replies.txt_content: 绝对是末影龙变态到可以在主世界吃方块曾经手残放出来一只把我家吃了

replies.author: ang_cheng
replies.txt_content: 蠹虫，绝对是蠹虫

replies.author: DreamsDeductive
replies.txt_content: 表示还有没发现哪个怪物恶心，觉得都挺可爱的

replies.txt_content:
